headline: Marathon Petroleum's El Paso Refinery Reports Power Outage That Caused Shutdown -- OPIS
summary: Marathon Petroleum's El Paso refinery suffered a power outage Tuesday that led to five hours of flaring, the company reported in a filing with Texas regulators. It was one of two reports of refinery...
